mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectConnectorRegister * Description : Connector 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM , (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS IDX , A.CNR_ID , A.CNR_NM , A.CNR_IPADR , A.CNR_PORTNO , A.CNR_CNN_TP_CD , A.FRST_REGR_ID , A.FRST_REG_DTM , A.LST_MDFR_ID , A.LST_MDF_DTM FROM( SELECT CNR_ID , CNR_NM , CNR_IPADR , CNR_PORTNO , CNR_CNN_TP_CD , FRST_REGR_ID , to_char(T_CNR_I.FRST_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , to_char(T_CNR_I.LST_MDF_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_CNR_I WHERE 1=1 AND FRST_REGR_ID = #{usr_id} ORDER BY LST_MDF_DTM DESC )A
